data.name: Paranormal Motel
data.detailed_description:
Main Features :

  • Paranormal Motel -Is a First person Horror game where you will have to be attentive to all the elements.

  • In total immersion: Scary atmosphere, Realistic graphics intensifies the horror experience.

  • American Motel inspired in the pure tradition (USA)

  • Gameplay: Walking simulator with many interactions with decorative objects.

  • Psychological horror: This night is like any other,
    but you will quickly find that this evening is going to totally degenerate.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Cindy is a receptionist at the Paradise Motel. She begins her night watch. She takes care of customer requests as usual. But that evening unforeseen events will terrify Cindy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 4Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI or AMD R9 280X or Better
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
